original_text: And when the five lords of the Philistines saw it, they returned that day to Ekron.
korean_text: 블레셋 다섯 방백이 이것을 보고 그 날에 에그론으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And when the five lords of the Philistines saw it
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 다섯 방백이 그것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: they returned that day to Ekron.
